overview: "Here is a sampling of Mark's earliest student work from Pratt Institute and The California Institute of the Arts. On some of the material the music has been removed for legal reasons. You'll have to use your imagination". Includes: Magic Cape (1989), Evolution (1989), Fat Kid (1989), Cup O' Java (1990), Safe (1990) and Calarts Demo Reel (1992).
title: Juvenilia
